name: water_getDispenseAmount
description: This function is used to check the current water outlet volume setting of the water purifier.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to check the current water outlet volume setting.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to be performed.
